escalations.comment: Stamp duty shortfall of ₹3.2L detected on commercial property registration in Vijayawada. Market value appears significantly understated compared to SRO guideline rates.

auditLog.detail: Escalation created based on revenue assurance audit finding.
Assigned to SR Vijayawada for investigation.

escalations.comment: Agricultural land registered as residential plot in Krishna district. Classification mismatch may have resulted in lower registration fee collection.

auditLog.detail: Escalation raised after cross-referencing land classification records.
Assigned to DR Krishna district.
Reminder sent to DR for pending response.

escalations.comment: Minor discrepancy in transfer duty calculation for a gift deed registration. Difference of ₹8,500 noted against expected computation.

auditLog.detail: Escalation created for transfer duty variance on gift deed.

escalations.comment: Repeated pattern of undervaluation in SRO Vijayawada-III. Five consecutive registrations show market value 30-40% below guideline rates.

responses.explanation: Reviewed all five registrations. Three cases involved distress sales with documented court orders permitting below-market transactions. Remaining two are under further review with local valuation committee.

auditLog.detail: Escalation raised for systematic undervaluation pattern.
Assigned to SR Vijayawada for explanation.
Response submitted with supporting evidence for 3 of 5 cases.

escalations.comment: Registration fee collected at old slab rates for a transaction executed after revised rates came into effect on 01-Oct-2024. Potential revenue loss of ₹45,000.

responses.explanation: The document was presented for registration on 28-Sep-2024 but processing was delayed due to system downtime. The old slab rate was applied based on the presentation date per standing circular 14/2023.
Additional clarification: the presentation receipt timestamp confirms 28-Sep-2024 at 16:42 IST, which is prior to the effective date of revised rates.

auditLog.detail: Escalation for incorrect fee slab application post rate revision.
Initial response provided citing system downtime and standing circular.
Follow-up response with presentation receipt evidence.

escalations.comment: Stamp duty evasion on a ₹1.8Cr property sale. Document registered as a lease agreement instead of sale deed to attract lower duty. Revenue loss estimated at ₹7.2L.

responses.explanation: Upon investigation, the document was indeed a sale transaction disguised as a lease. Recovery proceedings have been initiated under Section 47-A of the Indian Stamp Act. Demand notice issued to the parties.

auditLog.detail: Escalation for suspected stamp duty evasion via document misclassification.
Assigned to SR Vijayawada for investigation.
Investigation confirmed evasion. Recovery proceedings initiated.
Response accepted. Recovery of ₹7.2L confirmed in progress.

escalations.comment: Alleged non-collection of user charges for certified copy issuance at DRO Krishna. Approximately 120 certified copies issued without fee in Q3-2024.

responses.explanation: All 120 certified copies were issued to government departments under the inter-departmental fee waiver policy (GO Ms No. 45/2023). Each request has a valid requisition letter from the requesting department.
Cross-verified with requesting departments. All 120 requisitions confirmed authentic. Fee waiver correctly applied per government order.

auditLog.detail: Escalation for suspected non-collection of certified copy fees.
Response cites inter-departmental fee waiver policy.
Follow-up with cross-verification from requesting departments.
Escalation closed as rejected. Fee waiver was legitimately applied under GO Ms No. 45/2023.

escalations.comment: Large-scale revenue leakage identified in industrial property registrations. Multiple transactions in Auto Nagar area show consistent 25% undervaluation totalling ₹12.5L in potential stamp duty loss.

auditLog.detail: Escalation for systematic undervaluation in industrial property registrations.
Assigned to SR Vijayawada.
SLA deadline exceeded. No response received from assigned officer.

escalations.comment: Discrepancy in encumbrance certificate fees collected at DRO Machilipatnam sub-office. Fee register shows ₹24,000 shortfall over a 3-month period compared to the number of ECs issued.

auditLog.detail: Escalation for EC fee collection discrepancy.
SLA deadline exceeded without response.

escalations.comment: Delay in depositing collected registration fees into the government treasury account at multiple SROs under South Zone. Average delay of 5-7 working days observed against the mandated next-day deposit rule.

auditLog.detail: Escalation for delayed treasury deposits across South Zone SROs.
Assigned to DIG South Zone for zone-wide review.
SLA deadline exceeded. Awaiting DIG response.
